Ethical Considerations
=====================

Research Ethics
-------------
Ethical principles guiding the research.

Data Privacy
----------
Privacy protection measures:

* Data anonymization
* Secure storage
* Access controls
* Data retention policies

Participant Protection
-------------------
Measures to protect research participants:

1. Informed Consent
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* Clear communication
* Voluntary participation
* Right to withdraw

2. Risk Management
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* Risk assessment
* Mitigation strategies
* Support protocols

3. Data Rights
~~~~~~~~~~~~
* Access rights
* Data correction
* Data deletion

Compliance Framework
-----------------
Regulatory compliance measures:

* GDPR compliance
* Research ethics guidelines
* Institutional requirements
* Industry standards
